item.title: America’s new 1%: Free-spending DINKs shelling out for a luxury lifestyle of vacations and take-out
item.description: On average, DINKs spend four times more on dining each month than other Americans ($816 vs. $215) and allocate nearly double the typical budget for va...

item.title: Crypto entrepreneur Justin Sun buys $6 million banana—and plans to eat it unless Elon Musk wants to send it to space
item.description: Sun outbid six others for the iconic work.

item.title: SEC chair Gary Gensler resigns, leaves legacy of division and crypto feuds
item.description: Gensler oversaw a turbulent time for the Securities and Exchange Commission as it battled with crypto firms and Wall street.

item.title: The Rabbit R1 is an example of the AI industry’s “test your products in the real world” ethos
item.description: Rabbit CEO Jesse Lyu says its better to move fast and fix problems once users encounter them.

item.title: Silicon Valley billionaire warns ‘absolutely there’s a bubble’ in AI valuations: ‘Nobody would be surprised’ if OpenAI ‘disappeared next Monday’
item.description: Longtime tech executive Tom Siebel said the market is "way, way overvaluing" AI companies of all sizes, from startups to the $157 billion OpenAI.
